title: unable to handle a file with : in the name under a subdirectory

labels.name: fix-implemented
labels.description: A fix is available, but has not been merged or released, yet.

body:
Initially detected in 0.11.x but then reproduced on master (0.12.0rc3.dev79). Here is a variety of invocations (watch out -- `sudo`!) demonstrating it.

```shell
$> builtin cd /tmp; sudo rm -rf /tmp/testds; datalad create /tmp/testds; cd /tmp/testds; mkdir d; f=d/0:0; touch $f; datalad add $f;                                                                                           
[INFO   ] Creating a new annex repo at /tmp/testds 
create(ok): /tmp/testds (dataset)                                                                                          
[ERROR  ] d/0:0 is not a valid path [dataset.py:resolve_path:76] (ValueError) 
(dev) 1 13294 ->1 [1].....................................:Wed 15 May 2019 04:38:50 PM EDT:.
(git-annex)hopa:/tmp/testds[master]
$> builtin cd /tmp; sudo rm -rf /tmp/testds; datalad create /tmp/testds; cd /tmp/testds; f=0:0; touch $f; datalad add $f;
[INFO   ] Creating a new annex repo at /tmp/testds                                       
create(ok): /tmp/testds (dataset)                                                                                          
add(ok): /tmp/testds/0:0 (file)
save(ok): /tmp/testds (dataset)
action summary:
  add (ok: 1)
  save (ok: 1)
(dev) 1 13295 [1].....................................:Wed 15 May 2019 04:39:03 PM EDT:.
(git-annex)hopa:/tmp/testds[master]
$> builtin cd /tmp; sudo rm -rf /tmp/testds; datalad create /tmp/testds; cd /tmp/testds; mkdir d; f=d/0; touch $f; datalad add $f;                                                                                                
[INFO   ] Creating a new annex repo at /tmp/testds 
create(ok): /tmp/testds (dataset)                                                                                          
add(ok): /tmp/testds/d/0 (file)
save(ok): /tmp/testds (dataset)
action summary:
  add (ok: 1)
  save (ok: 1)
(dev) 1 13296 [1].....................................:Wed 15 May 2019 04:39:20 PM EDT:.
(git-annex)hopa:/tmp/testds[master]
$> builtin cd /tmp; sudo rm -rf /tmp/testds; datalad create /tmp/testds; cd /tmp/testds; mkdir d; f=d/0:; touch $f; datalad add $f;                                                                                                
[INFO   ] Creating a new annex repo at /tmp/testds 
create(ok): /tmp/testds (dataset)                                                                                          
[ERROR  ] d/0: is not a valid path [dataset.py:resolve_path:76] (ValueError) 
```
probably decides that it is an ssh RI or smth ? (didn't check)
